title: Data Mining на Python
description:
This report analyzes practical example of Clope clusterization
algorythm, as a way of building model database using similar items given
unknown cluster quantity. I will try to shed some light on Python's
advantages and drawbacks in this task's implementation as well as some
ways of scaling, optimizing and distributing the calculations, using
alternative implementations of Python(PyPy, Stackless, etc.).
